title: Systematic Case Analysis for Concept Acquisition: Intensive Language Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental concepts in the target language and intermediate-level learning experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment, emphasizing real-time monitoring of learning effectiveness through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can identify core concepts in language domains and analyze case-specific critical attributes with 90% accuracy.
Learners can explain complex language concepts with over 80% comprehension using systematically organized cases.
Learners can achieve 75+ points in formative assessments by demonstrating the ability to apply concepts to new language cases through analytical explanations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
